org.opends.server.protocols.http

Class SdkConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AbstractConnection
      • org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AbstractAsynchronousConnection
        • org.opends.server.protocols.http.SdkConnectionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Connection

    public class SdkConnectionAdapter
extends org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AbstractAsynchronousConnection
    Adapter class between LDAP SDK's Connection and OpenDJ server's HTTPClientConnection.
